game.name: Grab Lab
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Grab Lab is a crazy mix of puzzle and arcade game. Complete all unique levels - from simple to extremely advanced and demanding. Save the world - fix the gravity and rules of physics!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Grab Lab is a crazy mix of puzzle and arcade game. Complete all unique levels - from simple to extremely advanced and demanding. Save the world - fix the gravity and rules of physics!
